name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.task.skip.start.attempts
description:
The number of Task attempts AFTER which skip mode
    will be kicked off. When skip mode is kicked off, the
    tasks reports the range of records which it will process
    next, to the MR ApplicationMaster. So that on failures, the MR AM
    knows which ones are possibly the bad records. On further executions,
    those are skipped.

name: ha.failover-controller.graceful-fence.connection.retries
description: FC connection retries for graceful fencing

name: dfs.client.write.byte-array-manager.count-limit
description: The maximum number of arrays allowed for each array length.

name: io.map.index.skip
description:
Number of index entries to skip between each entry.
  Zero by default. Setting this to values larger than zero can
  facilitate opening large MapFiles using less memory.

name: dfs.datanode.peer.metrics.min.outlier.detection.samples
description:
Minimum number of packet send samples which are required to qualify for outlier detection.
      If the number of samples is below this then outlier detection is skipped.

name: tfile.fs.output.buffer.size
description: Buffer size used for FSDataOutputStream in bytes.
